short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track your time, save it and export it to CSV

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy to use time tracker.
Save time by date, add a note and download a report in CSV format.
Perfect for tracking daily activity on the browser for plain users or freelancers.

Features: 
* Notify every hour.
* Save hours to spreadsheet
* Export spreadsheet as CSV
* Add a note for every log you save

Todo: 
* Edit notification interval time
* Edit date format by user (dd/mm/yyy,mm/dd/yyyy etc.)

Made with <3 and is waiting for you're feedback - leave a review, request a feature and share your thoughts.

Happy time trackin'
